name: An Enigma that ate Earth
description:
Narrative -

Enigma X-1 is a black hole that sucks the life out of planets. Earth is in its captivity. To save Earth, place a flag on all the planets surrounding the black hole. 

Controls -

AWSD or ARROWS for movement. E for placing the hat. Space bar for thrust. 

Tips - 

1. Each planet has reverse gravity. So to penetrate it, use thrust to move faster.

2. Thrust uses fuel. Collect more fuel to fill up the bar.

3. Black hole emits waves of destruction. If you're hit, your controls will be reversed for a few seconds.
